error.title: ERROR
error.subtitle: OpenTouch Meeting Manager can't connect to the server
error.subtitle-err-login: Your OpenTouch account or your password is not good. Please change your parameters in order to connect to the OpenTouch server!
error.subtitle-err-certificate: Either the OpenTouch server can't be reached (bad address, down...) or you don't have the OpenTouch certificate correctly deployed on your computer.
error.subtitle-err-old: The OpenTouch server you're trying to reach don't support OTCMeeting yet. Please use an OpenTouch server R2.1 or higher.
